DescriptionData.Description:
★ Welcome to the home of LDXLR, we will show the best products and best service. Hope you have the best shopping experience and look forward to your visit.

-Resistance band can be used for whole body exercise. It is a multi-functional resistance band and is the most popular resistance band on the market today.
-Whether it's weight loss, hip lifting or muscle strength training, this product is excellent value for money. Our resistance band is small and portable. You can exercise at any time to protect your health. Different colors correspond to different resistance values, you can use two or more resistance bands to exercise according to your strength level.

★ Usage
✔ Pull-ups-increase strength and build muscles.

DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ Let Your Workouts Anywhere - Comes with a storage bag, you can easily pack them in your suitcase for travel and do exercises in the car or in your hotel room. Perfect for when you're short on time and don't have access to your usual equipment.

★ Different Resistance Levels - Offer a lot of versatility with 5 levels of resistance from 4-40Ibs (Light, Medium, Heavy, X-Heavy, XX-Heavy). Great for beginners as well as more advanced exercisers to add intensity in basic moves or traditional moves.

★ High-Quality Material - Made by 100% genuine, eco-friendly latex which is easy on the skin and has high elasticity for various workouts, like glutes and balance training, improves your core strength.

★ Good For Rehabilitation - Resistance bands provide more stability and have a low impact on your joints. For some people with limited mobility, these bands can allow them to get a deeper stretch to their muscle and improve flexibility.

★ Different Resistance Levels - Offer a lot of versatility with 5 levels of resistance from 4-40Ibs (Light, Medium, Heavy, X-Heavy, XX-Heavy). Great for beginners as well as more advanced exercisers to add intensity in basic moves or traditional moves.
